assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The research was reviewed and approved by the Ethics Committee Research of the involved Belgian academic hospital on 13/5/2019, with a required amendment to the protocol to adhere to the COVID-19 measures approved on 17/6/2020. The Medical Ethics Review Committee of the Dutch Academic Medical Center exempted this study from an official approval by their committee on 17/05/2021, as they concluded the Medical Research Involving Human Subjects Act (WMO) did not apply to our study.

funder.name: Operational Infrastructure Support Program, Victorian State Government
Hilde Van Esch is a clinical investigator of FWO Vlaanderen.
